subject: Basketball
Olympic Games
lead_paragraph: Following Paul George's horrific injury, Mark Cuban commented that the I.O.C. played a trick in "convincing the world that the Olympics were about patriotism and pride instead of money." His stance misses the point.
snippet: Following Paul George's horrific injury, Mark Cuban commented that the I.O.C. played a trick in "convincing the world that the Olympics were about patriotism and pride instead of money." His stance misses the point.
